shows.title: Represent!
shows.desc: You might not realise it, but the media plays a big part in continuing of a modern-day version of white supremacy. Through the images and characters it does and doesn't include, the media still tells a very white story. Legally Black challenge this. Having been affected by harmful effects of mis-representation and under-representation, their mission is to change the way the media portrays black people. By posting up alternative ads with black faces substituted into well-recognised white-faced visuals, they powerfully and creatively raise awareness of the lack of black representation in mainstream media.
